General.Name: Bharat Dynamics Limited
General.Description: Bharat Dynamics Limited engages in the manufacture and sale of guided missiles and allied equipment in India. It provides surface to air, air-to-air, and anti-tank guided missiles, as well as underwater weapons, launchers, counter measures dispensing systems, test equipment, torpedoes, and mechanized infantry weapons. The company offers its products to the Indian Armed forces and government of India. It also exports its products. The company was incorporated in 1970 and is based in Hyderabad, India.
General.Address: Plot No. 38-39, TSFC Building, Hyderabad, India, 500032
